item.title: Hello World
item.description:
I’ve wanted to bring my website back for a while, especially as I’ve become less active on social media. In an era of endless feeds and brain rot, returning to a personal website and blog feels right.

The annual web hosting bill added up, so I eventually cancelled it. I used to run WordPress, which does offer a nice back-end for managing content. But needing PHP, a MySQL database, and frequent updates to keep things secure always felt too heavy for my needs.

item.title: Foreign Legion: Buckets of Blood Steam Release
item.description:

The dawn escort mission is one of the prettier levels I built.

item.title: Read Me
item.description:
Hello! I’m Merlijn, a game developer & programmer from Belgium that plays a lot of video games.

Professionally, I divide my time between the 3 companies I founded. Mithra Games, my one-man indie game studio. Pandafish, a web development studio, and MyB’eats, an app and loyalty platform.

I’ve been tinkering with games since elementary school, building levels for Doom, Duke Nukem 3D, Quake and Half-Life. Later as a technical artist in the games industry. All in all I’ve worked on games for web, mobile, desktop and VR. These days I’m just doing my own thing with Godot.
